last_episode_to_air.name: The Counter-Clock Incident
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Commodore Robert April (the first commander of the Enterprise) on board, Kirk pursues a ship plunging into a supernova, and enters a universe where time runs backwards.

name: Star Trek
overview: The animated adventures of Captain Kirk, Mr. Spock and the crew of the Starship Enterprise.

episodes.name: Drawn to the Final Frontier: The Making of Star Trek: The Animated Series
episodes.overview: The Making of Star Trek: The Animated Series

episodes.name: Beyond the Farthest Star
episodes.overview: In orbit around a dead star, the Enterprise comes across a huge starship inhabited by a parasitic life form that threatens the entire ship.

episodes.name: Yesteryear
episodes.overview: Spock travels back in time to prevent his death as a young Vulcan.

episodes.name: One of Our Planets Is Missing
episodes.overview: The crew of the Enterprise races to find a way to stop a cloud from destroying inhabited planets.

episodes.name: The Lorelei Signal
episodes.overview: Female crew members must take over the Enterprise when the men are incapacitated by a race of sirens.

episodes.name: More Tribbles, More Troubles
episodes.overview: Cyrano Jones introduces tribbles that cannot reproduce.

episodes.name: The Survivor
episodes.overview: The Enterprise finds a long-lost explorer.

episodes.name: The Infinite Vulcan
episodes.overview: A race of plant people, and their master, have a plan to force peace onto the galaxy.

episodes.name: The Magicks of Megas-tu
episodes.overview: At the center of the galaxy, the Enterprise discovers a race of powerful aliens.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Planet
episodes.overview: Kirk returns to the "shore leave" planet, but it's not as peaceful as it was when they last saw it.

episodes.name: Mudd's Passion
episodes.overview: Space con artist Harry Mudd returns, selling a fake love potion.

episodes.name: The Terratin Incident
episodes.overview: The Enterprise crew begins to shrink after radiation exposure.

episodes.name: The Time Trap
episodes.overview: The Enterprise crew must work with Klingons to escape from a pocket universe.

episodes.name: The Ambergris Element
episodes.overview: While exploring the planet Argo, Kirk and Spock are turned into water breathers.

episodes.name: The Slaver Weapon
episodes.overview: Spock, Sulu, and Uhura discover a time capsule from an ancient and technologically advanced race. However, it draws some unwanted attention.

episodes.name: The Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: Telepathic aliens put Kirk, Spock and McCoy in a zoo.

episodes.name: The Jihad
episodes.overview: Kirk and Spock are recruited for a heist to recover a stolen relic, which if not recovered could spark an galactic jihad.

episodes.name: The Pirates of Orion
episodes.overview: With Spock stricken down by a fatal disease, the Enterprise must track down the drug that can cure him before it is too late.

episodes.name: Bem
episodes.overview: The Enterprise crew is joined by a unpredictable alien called Ari bn Bem, an independent observer from the planet Pandro.

episodes.name: The Practical Joker
episodes.overview: The computer of the Enterprise gains partial sentience and starts playing practical jokes on the crew.

episodes.name: Albatross
episodes.overview: Dr. McCoy is arrested and held responsible for causing a plague that ravaged the planet Dramia II, where he performed a mass-innoculation 19 years earlier.

episodes.name: How Sharper Than a Serpent's Tooth
episodes.overview: The Enterprise runs into a being that once visited Earth and influenced the Mayan culture.

episodes.name: The Counter-Clock Incident
episodes.overview: With Commodore Robert April (the first commander of the Enterprise) on board, Kirk pursues a ship plunging into a supernova, and enters a universe where time runs backwards.
